transcript:
Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji. Good afternoon sir.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Uh sir main Hanisha baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se. Actually sir mere recent trend tha ki aapki na Shraddha mam ki baat hui thi last week actually. To aapki or se na mail pe client satisfaction na uh low aaya tha. To uska kya reason tha isliye hum improve kar paate aapko aapko koi problem aa rahi hai services mein?
Customer: Abhi to bata nahi payenge hum bahar hai office mein nahi hai. Ji ji office mein jaane ke baad hi malum ho payega. Main mam se bhi baat hui thi actually, thik hai? Shraddha mam mam se to wo bol rahi thi ki uh kisi ko hire karna hai account handle karne ke liye. To keh rahi thi ki unka phone number bhi wo provide karengi lekin uh abhi unse baat nahi ho pa raha tha. To mere ko ye jaanna tha ki aapki or se na ek concern raise hua tha. Abhi aapko koi bhi issue aa raha hai uh services mein? Kuch bhi issue aapko aa raha ho to main improve kar du apne side se.
Executive: Kyunki aapki or se na jo mail se hume reply aaya tha na wo client satisfaction mein no aaya tha. Shraddha mam se aapki baat hui thi sir. To uska kya reason tha wo main jaanna chah rahi thi.
Customer: Abhi kaise bata sakte hai hum office jayenge tabhi bata sakte hai na?
Executive: Nahi lekin jo iska deal karta hai usse baat karenge tab office jayenge hum parso, kal nahi jayenge parso jayenge.
Customer: Thik hai. Uh actually sir jo bhi aapko issue aayega sab wo to main resolve kar dungi lekin us din kya issue aaya tha ki aapne uh mail pe wo kar diya tha no kar diya tha satisfaction.
Executive: Yaar humko malum nahi hai wo jo kiya hai usko pata hoga.
Customer: Achha aapne baat nahi ki thi uh is baare mein?
Executive: Nahi.
Customer: Achha thik hai. Sir unhone baat ki thi wo abhi available nahi hai aap ye keh rahe hai.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Achha thik hai. To sir aap office jaake na baat karwa dena. Baki fir hume uh close karna padega concern ko.
Executive: Thik thik thik. Thik hai. Okay thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquired about low client satisfaction score.

- Customer unable to specify the issue immediately.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to resolve any current issues.

- Asked to discuss the issue after visiting office.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss after visiting the office.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- client satisfaction, services, concern
